messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] No Snow!
messages.msgSnippet: (I had to reply to you on this one also!) kind of reading emails backwards tonight. Ok I am here to tell you 71 is a heat wave! 70 is considered a beautiful
messages.messageBody:
(I had to reply to you on this one also!) kind of reading emails backwards
tonight.

Ok I am here to tell you 71 is a heat wave!
70 is considered a beautiful warm day here in ND.

Thanks for the education on Florida, my small mind is
opening to the thought that your windows aren't barred up,
and life isn't so consumed with "bad boys, bad boys what ya gonna do when
they come for you?" people. ha! Moldy fruit and sloppy pizza hmmmmm........

We have Pizza Hut, (among others pizza places) they do have a NEW YORKER
that is good. Our bananas in the stores are sometimes still green.
Of course for the topic of pizza, I have heard so much about authentic New
York
pizza, that it would the pizza chains around here to shame. It must be good.

My 16 year old son got his first deer this weekend. (thanks to my ex, the
hunting
fever wore off on to my baby).
So, he called home last night and told me to get some newspaper ready,
as he was bringing home a hind quarter>
I was freaking out!!!!! It was like a killer called and said he was on his
way!!!
Like .........there was going to be a hind quarter of anything brought into
my
home! LOL NO WAY!!!
I am not into deer anything, unless its produced by Disney!

So ponder on this one!

Linda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] No Snow!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Linda, Jacli here :) Just when you thought it was safe... You are too funny!  We live in Boca Raton so the only crime we re truly worried about is the
messages.messageBody:
Hey Linda, Jacli here :)
Just when you thought it was safe...
You are too funny! We live in Boca Raton so the only crime
we're
truly worried about is the outrageous prices at the local
grocerie stores,
the mashed-up-moldy-utterly-gross stuff they try to push
off as fruit
and the thin soggy mess that they have the nerve to call
New York style pizza here. In fact I haven't had a decent
double dough extra large in I don't know how long. Now
that's criminal!

Take care - it's gone down to 71, I'm going to buy a
sweater - brr! :)
Jacli
*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********
On 11/11/2001 at 11:43 AM
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
Message: 14
Date: Sat, 10 Nov 2001 16:15:22 EST
From: staclarspr@...
Subject: Re: I do not like snow
Bully for you!
Yes, you hit the nail on the head. We are up in the 50's
and its like a heat
wave.
The snow did melt and went away. I know its just lurking
out there ready to
dump on us again when we least expect it!
Florida has a wonderful ring to it! I should like to bask
in everything it
would have
to offer, except for the crime. See I know this as I watch
wayyy to much TV,
which ha ha, scares me right into staying where I am at.
And like ND doesn't have the crime, but in the winter the
kooks all seem to
leave!
thinking again way to much! LOL
Linda
